scripts.build: cp src/index.html build/index.html; cp src/about.html build; cp src/contact.html build; cp -r src/assets build; cp -r src/js build; cp -r src/downloads build; node_modules/.bin/sass src/styles/index.scss build/styles/index.css
scripts.deploy: npm run build && aws s3 sync ./build s3://gida-landing --acl public-read --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3EBPTUIIJ9IOB --paths "/*"
